alert.note: Alert for Dallas (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued September 01 at 6:33PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 PM CDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of central Alabama, including the following county, Dallas. * WHEN...Until 945 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Flooding of low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 632 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the warned area. Between 3 and 5 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts up to 1 inch are possible in the warned area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Orrville, Bogue Chitto, Central Mills, Dannelly Reservoir, Safford and Crumptonia.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
